itunes:title: Naya Rivera is Sorry but Not Sorry
title: Naya Rivera is Sorry but Not Sorry
description:
Grab a box of tissues we’re talking about Naya Rivera. The nearly successful child star turned extremely successful Glee star tells it like it is and Ashley and Claire try not to weep their way through a lifetime of celeb name drops that ended too soon. 

New merch just dropped!! Shop the celebrity worm, worms don’t rat, and more: https://celebritymemoirbookclub.square.site/

Meet us at Nicky’s Unisex in Williamsburg Thursday, December 16 at 7 pm for live comedy!!

Join the Facebook group to chat with the other worms! https://www.facebook.com/groups/cmbcwormhole

Follow us on Twitter @cmbc_podcast and Instagram @celebritymemoirbookclub 


Art by @adrianne_manpearl and theme song by @ashleesimpsonross



Support the show
